attributes.action: Stop HMRC's disposal of 6000 Fixed Term Apointees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite working for two and a half years for the Civil Service I am being dismissed along with 50 other staff in my office. The way in which it is being done is illegal as we should be made redundant. Yet they are simply replacing us with permanent members of staff. Our terms and conditions state we should have equal rights to our permanent staff although it is clear this is not the case. Over 6000 FTA's will lose their jobs despite long and loyal service.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
